text:
Caroline Boujard (born 6 January 1994) is a French rugby union player. She played for the France women's national rugby union team. She participated at the 2015 Women's Six Nations Championship, 2017 Women's Rugby World Cup, 2018 Women's Six Nations Championship, and 2020 Women's Six Nations Championship.
She played for Montpellier rugby club.

annotations.surface_form: France women's national rugby union team
